name: Payments Integration Developer
description: LATOKEN is a top 10 digital assets exchange (according to Coinmarketcap) and a leader in tokenization.   Responsibilities  Integrate blockchains and payment service providers into our Centralized Exchange to automate custody and deposit/withdrawal functions Develop secure and high load services to enable our customers to make easy transfers across the world    Requirements  2+ years of development experience Olympiad winning problem-solving skills, fast and robust results Experience in one of Node.js/C++/C#/Java/Python You want to create world-changing products    Why to join  Be a part of the team transforming the financial system Competitive salary and exceptional bonuses Rapid growth and trainee program (option to try multiple roles to grow as the T person) Top 10 exchange, leading in security tokens International team (ex McKinsey, hedge funds etc)    Feel a great fit - apply now
